description: Original had Zacky as lead guitar instead of Synyster Gates. Fixed it.
title: Turn The Other Way

reports.summary:
Synyster Gates only recorded the solo for the song "To End The Rapture". All of the other guitar parts on this album were recorded by Zacky Vengeance.
